title: Dark Star Varus

embed.description: This is a teaser spotlight of Dark Star Varus with ingame gameplay! Price: 1350RP Skin name is CONFIRMED as Dark Star Varus, particles & SFX may not be final. Check out the other skins in this cycle. Full Skin Spotlight will be released in the near future which will go more indepth.

body:
You know I use Varus as my go to adc whenever I play him, he is my 3rd most played champion on my account and I absolutely love him and trust me when I say I also love this skin. I love the animations, I love the theme and will be picking it up in the future for sure. Though I feel like his voice is a bit out of place on the skin and that while I understand the difference between a legendary and an epic skin I feel like a different voice filter could completely change the way the skin feels and looks while adding a lot more overall value to the user experience. Not necessarily to change the dialogue or the beautiful animations of course. Just my opinion though.

Let me emphasize again though that this doesn't mean I'm entirely unhappy with the skin because I definitely want to add this to my Varus collection of skins.
